name: Dead by Daylight - Of Flesh and Mud
name_original: Dead by Daylight - Of Flesh and Mud
description: Of Flesh and Mud is the third Chapter for Dead by Daylight. Prepare for dark hexes and flesh made out of mud and decay, if you dare enter Backwater Swamp and live through the horror it brings. A new killer - The Hag - awaits you in the waterland area and you will meet a new survivor: Ace Visconti.
